intro: Paratropia obovata, commonly known as the broad-ovate paratropia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. The flowers are often visited by pollinators such as bees and butterflies, contributing to its ecological significance. Its botanical features make it a notable species in horticultural and ecological studies.
